title: UI Element
description: A UI element definition in a Minecraft Bedrock UI screen file. UI elements define the visual and interactive components of Minecraft's user interface.

fields.title: Type
fields.description: The type of UI element. Determines how the element is rendered and behaves.

fields.title: Renderer
fields.description: The renderer to use for custom element types. Examples include 'hud_player_renderer', 'inventory_item_renderer', etc.

fields.title: Layer
fields.description: The rendering layer for this element. Higher values render on top of lower values.

fields.title: Size
fields.description: The size of the UI element. Can be specified as [width, height] where each can be a number (pixels), percentage string ('100%'), or special value ('fill', '100%c', '100%cm').

fields.title: Offset
fields.description: The offset of the UI element from its anchor position. Specified as [x, y] in pixels.

fields.title: Minimum Size
fields.description: The minimum size constraints for the UI element.

fields.title: Maximum Size
fields.description: The maximum size constraints for the UI element.

fields.title: Anchor From
fields.description: The anchor point on the parent element from which this element is positioned.

fields.title: Anchor To
fields.description: The anchor point on this element used for positioning.

fields.title: Orientation
fields.description: The orientation for stack panels, determining the direction children are laid out.

fields.title: Texture
fields.description: The texture path for image elements. Relative to the resource pack textures folder.

fields.title: UV Coordinates
fields.description: UV coordinates for texture mapping, specified as [u, v].

fields.title: UV Size
fields.description: The size of the UV region to sample from the texture.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: The color tint applied to the element, specified as [r, g, b] with values 0.0-1.0.

fields.title: Alpha
fields.description: The opacity of the element, from 0.0 (transparent) to 1.0 (opaque).

fields.title: Visible
fields.description: Whether this element is visible by default.

fields.title: Enabled
fields.description: Whether this element is enabled and can be interacted with.

fields.title: Ignored
fields.description: If true, this element is ignored during layout and rendering.

fields.title: Text
fields.description: The text content for label elements. Can include localization keys.

fields.title: Text Alignment
fields.description: The horizontal alignment of text within a label.

fields.title: Shadow
fields.description: Whether to render a shadow behind text.

fields.title: Font Type
fields.description: The font to use for text rendering.

fields.title: Font Size
fields.description: The size of the font for text rendering.

fields.title: Font Scale Factor
fields.description: A multiplier for the font size.

fields.title: Controls
fields.description: Child elements contained within this element.

fields.title: Child Element
fields.description: A child UI element. The key is the element name, optionally with @base_element syntax for inheritance.

fields.title: Bindings
fields.description: Data bindings that connect UI element properties to game data.

fields.title: Binding Name
fields.description: The name of the data source to bind to (e.g., '#player_name').

fields.title: Binding Name Override
fields.description: The property on the UI element to bind the value to.

fields.title: Binding Type
fields.description: The type of binding.

fields.title: Binding Collection Name
fields.description: The name of the collection when using collection bindings.

fields.title: Binding Condition
fields.description: When the binding should be evaluated.

fields.title: Source Control Name
fields.description: The name of the source control for view bindings.

fields.title: Source Property Name
fields.description: The property name on the source control.

fields.title: Target Property Name
fields.description: The property name on the target element.

fields.title: Button Mappings
fields.description: Mappings from input buttons to actions.

fields.title: From Button ID
fields.description: The input button that triggers the action.

fields.title: To Button ID
fields.description: The action button to trigger.

fields.title: Mapping Type
fields.description: The type of button mapping.

fields.title: Input Mode Condition
fields.description: The input mode required for this mapping.

fields.title: Animations
fields.description: Animation references to apply to this element.

fields.title: Animation Reset Name
fields.description: The name of the animation state to reset to.

fields.title: Variables
fields.description: Variable definitions for conditional logic.

fields.title: Requires
fields.description: The condition that must be met for this variable to be active.

fields.title: Clips Children
fields.description: Whether child elements are clipped to this element's bounds.

fields.title: Allow Clipping
fields.description: Whether this element can be clipped by parent elements.

fields.title: Propagate Alpha
fields.description: Whether alpha transparency is propagated to child elements.

fields.title: Grid Rescaling Type
fields.description: How the grid resizes its cells.

fields.title: Grid Item Template
fields.description: The template element to use for grid items.

fields.title: Grid Dimension Binding
fields.description: The binding for determining grid dimensions.

fields.title: Collection Name
fields.description: The name of the collection to use for grid or stack panel items.

fields.title: Factory
fields.description: The factory configuration for dynamic element creation.

fields.title: Focus Enabled
fields.description: Whether this element can receive focus.

fields.title: Default Focus Precedence
fields.description: Priority for receiving default focus.

fields.title: Focus Change Up
fields.description: The element to focus when navigating up.

fields.title: Focus Change Down
fields.description: The element to focus when navigating down.

fields.title: Focus Change Left
fields.description: The element to focus when navigating left.

fields.title: Focus Change Right
fields.description: The element to focus when navigating right.

fields.title: TTS Ignore Count
fields.description: Whether to ignore this element when counting for text-to-speech.

fields.title: TTS Skip Message
fields.description: Whether to skip this element in text-to-speech narration.

fields.title: TTS Control Type Order Priority
fields.description: The priority for ordering elements in text-to-speech.

fields.title: Consume Event
fields.description: Whether input events are consumed by this element.

fields.title: Always Handle Pointer
fields.description: Whether pointer events are always handled by this element.

fields.title: Modal
fields.description: Whether this element acts as a modal overlay.

fields.title: Prevent Touch Input
fields.description: Whether touch input is blocked by this element.

fields.title: Locked Control
fields.description: The control to display when this element is locked.

fields.title: Slider Range
fields.description: The range for slider elements.

fields.title: Slider Steps
fields.description: The number of discrete steps in a slider.

fields.title: Slider Select On Hover
fields.description: Whether the slider value changes on hover.

fields.title: Max Length
fields.description: Maximum character length for text input elements.

fields.title: Text Box Name
fields.description: The name identifier for a text box.

fields.title: Placeholder Text
fields.description: Placeholder text shown when an input is empty.

fields.title: Virtual Keyboard Buffer Control
fields.description: Whether this input uses a virtual keyboard buffer.

fields.title: Nine Slice Bottom
fields.description: The bottom size for nine-slice image rendering.

fields.title: Nine Slice Top
fields.description: The top size for nine-slice image rendering.

fields.title: Nine Slice Left
fields.description: The left size for nine-slice image rendering.

fields.title: Nine Slice Right
fields.description: The right size for nine-slice image rendering.

fields.title: Tiled
fields.description: Whether the texture is tiled when rendering.

fields.title: Fill
fields.description: Whether image fills its container.

fields.title: Grayscale
fields.description: Whether the element is rendered in grayscale.

fields.title: Keep Ratio
fields.description: Whether to maintain aspect ratio when scaling.

fields.title: Bilinear
fields.description: Whether to use bilinear filtering for textures.

fields.title: Clip Pixel Perfect
fields.description: Whether clipping is pixel-perfect.

fields.title: Scroll Speed
fields.description: The speed of scrolling in scroll views.

fields.title: Scrollbar Touch Button
fields.description: Whether the scrollbar responds to touch.

fields.title: Jump To Bottom On Update
fields.description: Whether to auto-scroll to bottom when content updates.

fields.title: Scrollbar Box
fields.description: Reference to the scrollbar box element.

fields.title: Scrollbar Track
fields.description: Reference to the scrollbar track element.

fields.title: Scroll View Port
fields.description: Reference to the scroll viewport element.

fields.title: Scroll Content
fields.description: Reference to the scrollable content element.

fields.title: Scroll Box And Track Panel
fields.description: Reference to the panel containing scrollbar box and track.
